short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: replaces texts on the page using regex and a json template

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Version 1.1 only contains reorganization of inputs and adjustments to styling, as well as improved documentation.

This extension allows you to manipulate the text of web pages through a configuration, where you can specify rules via regex to capture and modify text on the page.

Rules are applied every 2 seconds.

Learn create a config file https://github.com/gabrielogregorio/page-text-replacer?tab=readme-ov-file#how-create-a-config
